response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity. I believe you will find immense value in our product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your specific needs. The product is worth $1,200,000 to me, reflecting its unique features, high-quality materials, and the expertise that went into its creation. I am offering you this exceptional item at a special price, tailored to reflect its significant worth to you, at $960,000.

Considering the product's value to you at $800,000, this offer represents an excellent chance for you to acquire it at a premium yet fair price. I am confident that this investment will not only meet but exceed your expectations.

Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I am here to answer any questions you might have and assist you throughout the process.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 960000}
